page.title: 04EDUCATION
page.content: {COLINSBURGH SCHOOL}was built in 1873. The original building was altered and added to between October 1953 and January 1955 when the current building was opened. The school has 55 pupils some of whom come from the neighbouring villages of Arncroach and Kilconquhar. There are three classes :the 5-7 year olds are downstairs while the 8-9 year olds and the 10-12 year olds are in clssrooms upstairs. After seven years at Primary the pupils transfer to Waid Academy, Anstruther,a six year secondary school. There they study for O grades at 15 and Highers at 17. They travel there in a one-man operated double decker bus.
